page.title: 19TRANSPORT - M2 TRAFFIC
page.content: We did a survey to find out how many vehicles were entering and leaving the M2 motorway at the junction with the A228,Strood to Cuxton road. In half an hour on a Thursday afternoon in May the following numbers of vehicles were counted entering the M2:92,and coming off the M2:135. A further traffic survey was carried out on the eastbound carriageway of the M2. The results over an hour's period were as follows:- 912 cars, 366 lorries, 12 coaches, 13 motorcycles, 3 pedalcycles 2 pedestrians. This was done on a Thursday afternoon from 3.15 p.m.to 3.45 p.m.
